Sequence Information.Peptide Name: CA(1-13)M(1-18) (Synthetic AMPs, hybrid peptide, cecropin A(1-13)+melittin(1-18), XXA, UCLL1c)

Literature Information.Literature: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals that this sequence is similar (83.33%) toCA(1-13)M(1-13)K:20%; L: 17%, G: 13%.Activity: lethal concentration (LC): active against E. coli D21 (LC 0.3 uM), P. aeruginosa OT97 (LC 0.7 uM), B. subtilis (LC 0.4 uM), B. megaterium (LC 0.4 uM), S. aureus Cowan 1 (LC 1 uM), and S. pyogenes (LC 2 uM).In vitro toxicity: sheep RBC (LC >500 uM), not hemo.lytic.

Literature Information.Reference: Proc Natl Acad Sci U S A. 1990 Jun;87(12):4761-5. doi: 10.1073/pnas.87.12.4761.PubMed
Literature Information.Title: All-D amino acid-containing channel-forming antibiotic peptides.
